backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles, access control, and 1:1 messaging with conversation storage and message send/query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented app features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styling with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell that mounts the frontend React app via main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Developer guide explaining project structure and how to modify and deploy the Whatchat app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing setup using TanStack Router plus theme and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperInfoCar: UI card showing developer instructions for editing code and deploying the app, including optional doc link.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal requiring new users to submit name and email before using the app, with backend profile save integration.
frontend/src/components/WhatchatLayout.t: Layout component with header, mobile nav, logout handling, and unread message badge, wrapping child content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, conversations, messages, sending, reading, and unread counts using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx: Login screen offering Internet Identity sign-in and showcasing app features before redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/screens/ChatListScreen.tsx: Displays the user's chat list, allows starting new chats by principal ID, and supports manual refresh of conversation IDs.
frontend/src/screens/ChatThreadScreen.ts: Shows messages in a specific conversation, lets users send messages, mark them as read, and manually refresh the thread.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides profile and principal ID display with copy functionality, plus general user settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-backed parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, and plugins for the app's UI styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and current state of the Whatchat app.
